description: A jumper cable, like you've seen many times before: it's a short multi-stranded copper cable with power leads on either end, whose main purpose is to share power between vehicles, but can also link other electrical systems.

name: heavy duty tow cable
description: An extremely heavy duty tow cable made from thick steel wire.  If attached to a vehicle, it could be used to pull another vehicle of any weight.
A long, thick, heavy-duty cable with power leads on either end.  It looks like you could use it to hook up two vehicles to each other.  Can also link other electrical systems.
This is the cable of the gods: 50 meters long, light as a feather and fits in a matchbook.  You're sure this wasn't supposed to exist, and the way it shimmers makes you uneasy.
